title: Keycloak 26.2.4 released
content: To download the release go to .   UPGRADING  Before upgrading refer to for a complete list of changes.   ALL RESOLVED ISSUES   ENHANCEMENTS   * Clarify when to use podman docs   BUGS   * Double click on social provider link causes page has expired error login/ui  * IPv6 support: Broker tests failing with proxy configuration ci  * After migrating to newer Keycloak, token refreshes using inherited offline    sessions return access tokens with invalid exp value oidc  * Keycloak 26.2.0 UI Performance Degradation admin/ui  * duplicate key value violates unique constraint "constraint_offl_cl_ses_pk3"    infinispan  * JGroups errors when running a containerized Keycloak in Strict FIPS mode and    with Istio infinispan  * Update Job Pod is listed in the keycloak discovery service operator
